p.k: Short, Drama Denmark, Finland, Colombia (2014). Hrají: Yusuf Kamal El-Ali, Zeinab Rahal, Amira Helene Larsen. Režie: Rungano Nyoni, Hamy Ramezan.
p.d: Copenhagen. A police station. A foreign woman, wearing a burqa, is there with her young son to file a complaint. Yet, it seems the translator is not willing to report what she is telling.
